channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: My Experience with Codealike
item.description: I have been using Codealike for a while now and thought I'd share my experience and things that I like about codealike with everyone. I did mention codealike on This Week on Ch9 when I hosted it last week with Greg Duncan.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
